mod-description.m_WhereIsMyBody: This mod draw lines to your corpses. The mod is optimized and customizable./n/nInitially, "darkfrei" made such mod. This mod fully rewritten from scratch with new features.

mod-setting-name.WHMB_ignore_if_less_n_items: Ignore your body if it has <=N items
mod-setting-name.WHMB_create_chart_tags_after_death: Create a chart tag after death
